main event: On 1 December 1962, an object entered the atmosphere trailing fire, broke into pieces, and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was first observed trailing fire before breaking apart in the atmosphere., The sighting was reported by military sources., The object was located at coordinates 64-45N 29-45W., The speed of the object was unknown., The conclusion drawn was that it was a ball-meteor, fireball, or satellite.
sighted object: Object entering the atmosphere trailing fire
